lead_paragraph: Facing a soft market for initial offerings, some start-ups like Facebook, Zynga and Yelp have instead turned to private investors for large late-stage investments.
snippet: Facing a soft market for initial offerings, some start-ups like Facebook, Zynga and Yelp have instead turned to private investors for large late-stage investments.

headline.main: For Start-Ups, Late Bursts of Private Cash
headline.seo: For Start-Ups, Late Bursts of Cash, Not I.P.O.’s
headline.print_headline: For Start-Ups, Late Bursts of Private Cash
